description:
1. Depending on the resolution of the display, the position of the clock may change. Look for the corresponding folder in C: \ Program Files (x86) \ Steam \ steamapps \ workshop \ content.
Open index.html with something like Notepad ++. <Div style = "position: absolute; left: 440px; top: 340px;" class = "time" id = "time" data - hours = "" Change the resolution of the data - minutes = "">.

2. Explain how to change the color of the clock.
Look for the corresponding folder in C: \ Program Files (x86) \ Steam \ steamapps \ workshop \ content.
Open style.css in the CSS folder with something like Notepad ++.
Https://html-color.codes/
Search for the color you like, search for 0BFDFD and replace with Ctrl + h

3. You can make sure that the direction of the clock does not change with the mouse, and it is also possible not to display the clock only.

3 will answer only when asked.

Supplement: Please comment if you can not understand. I'm sorry if I made a mistranslation
title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
